welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bolivar, Colombia! Known for its rich cultural heritage and breathtaking landscapes, our charming city has something for every type of traveler. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that Bolivar has to offer. Â¡Bienvenidos!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farfan Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Farfan Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Eden Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at El Eden Airport, mainly used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
